styles.css: html,body{height:100%;color:var(--wp--preset--color--contrast);background:radial-gradient(800px circle at 18% 10%, rgba(255,77,36,0.35), rgba(11,12,15,0) 60%),radial-gradient(900px circle at 18% 72%, rgba(255,77,36,0.22), rgba(11,12,15,0) 65%),var(--wp--preset--color--base)}body{min-height:100vh;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.wp-site-blocks{background:transparent;min-height:100vh;flex:1;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.wp-site-blocks>footer{margin-top:auto}.wp-site-blocks>header{position:relative;overflow:visible;border-bottom:0!important}.wp-site-blocks>header *{border-bottom:0!important}.wp-site-blocks>header hr,.wp-site-blocks>header .wp-block-separator{display:none!important}.wp-site-blocks>header:after{content:"";position:absolute;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);bottom:0;width:100vw;height:1px;background:linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(255,255,255,0),rgba(255,255,255,0.18),rgba(255,255,255,0));pointer-events:none}.joco-no-global-padding.has-global-padding{padding-left:0!important;padding-right:0!important}.joco-no-global-padding.has-global-padding>.alignwide,.joco-no-global-padding.has-global-padding>.alignfull{margin-left:0!important;margin-right:0!important}.joco-feature-cards .wp-block-columns{align-items:stretch}.joco-feature-cards .wp-block-column{display:flex}.joco-feature-cards .joco-feature-card{height:100%;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.joco-about-cards .wp-block-columns{align-items:stretch}.joco-about-cards .wp-block-column{display:flex}.joco-about-cards .joco-about-card{height:100%;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;min-height:150px}.joco-contact-cards .wp-block-columns{align-items:stretch;flex-wrap:nowrap;gap:24px}.joco-contact-cards .wp-block-column{display:flex;min-width:0}.joco-contact-cards .joco-contact-card{height:100%;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column}.joco-contact-form label{display:block;margin:0 0 6px;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.55);font-size:11px;letter-spacing:0.02em}.joco-contact-form input,.joco-contact-form textarea{width:100%;box-sizing:border-box;background:rgba(255,255,255,0.06);-webkit-backdrop-filter:blur(10px);backdrop-filter:blur(10px);border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.18);border-radius:12px;color:var(--wp--preset--color--contrast);padding:10px 12px;font-size:13px;outline:none;box-shadow:inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.08)}.joco-contact-form textarea{resize:vertical;min-height:130px}.joco-contact-form .joco-form-row{display:flex;gap:18px;align-items:flex-start;margin:0 0 14px}.joco-contact-form .joco-form-row>.joco-form-field{flex:1 1 0;min-width:0;margin:0}.joco-contact-form .joco-form-field{margin:0 0 14px}.joco-contact-form input:focus,.joco-contact-form textarea:focus{border-color:rgba(255,77,36,0.55);box-shadow:0 0 0 3px rgba(255,77,36,0.18),inset 0 1px 0 rgba(255,255,255,0.10)}@media (max-width: 900px){.joco-contact-cards .wp-block-columns{flex-wrap:wrap}}@media (max-width: 640px){.joco-contact-form .joco-form-row{flex-direction:column;gap:14px}}.wp-element-button,.wp-block-button__link{background:var(--wp--preset--color--primary);color:#000;border-radius:999px;padding:10px 18px;font-weight:600;text-decoration:none;border:1px solid transparent}.wp-block-button.is-style-outline .wp-element-button,.wp-block-button.is-style-outline .wp-block-button__link{background:transparent;color:var(--wp--preset--color--contrast);border-color:rgba(255,255,255,0.35)}.wp-element-button:hover,.wp-block-button__link:hover{filter:brightness(1.03)}.has-secondary-background-color{border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.06);box-shadow:0 14px 40px rgba(0,0,0,0.35)}.joco-header-links .wp-block-navigation__container{list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0;display:flex;gap:22px;align-items:center}.joco-header-links .wp-block-navigation-item{margin:0}.joco-header-links .wp-block-navigation-item__content{color:var(--wp--preset--color--contrast);text-decoration:none;padding:8px 0;border-radius:999px}.joco-header-links .current-menu-item>.wp-block-navigation-item__content,.joco-header-links .current-menu-ancestor>.wp-block-navigation-item__content{padding:8px 14px;border:1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.18);background:rgba(255,77,36,0.10)}.joco-eyebrow{text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:0.18em;font-size:11px}.page-contact .joco-contact-cards .wp-block-columns{flex-wrap:nowrap!important;gap:24px!important}.page-contact .joco-contact-cards .wp-block-column{flex:1 1 0!important}.page-contact .joco-contact-cards .wp-block-column:nth-child(1){flex-basis:56%!important}.page-contact .joco-contact-cards .wp-block-column:nth-child(2){flex-basis:44%!important}@media (max-width: 900px){.page-contact .joco-contact-cards .wp-block-columns{flex-wrap:wrap!important}}
